name: Dare or Truth #MoJam2018
description:
Dare Or Truth is a small party game made under 48h during the 2018 edtition of Montreal Game Jam (MoJam). 

The theme was Truth or Dare, so we decided to take the classic Truth or Dare concept and adding a twist to it: all the players will have to compete in different mini-games, and the winner will then choose the truth to ask to the loser, following ideas on the screen.

Polished Version now available! See devlogs to know what changed!
